name: Untitled document (1)
description: Sculpting Language with Precision. (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

additional_params.name: additional_params
additional_params.info: JSON-formatted dictionary to pass to the data field of the request to the Unstructured API

base64_content.name: base64_content
base64_content.info: Provide the base64 encoded content of the file

code.value:
import json
import base64
from io import BytesIO
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.io import MessageInput, StrInput, Output, MessageTextInput
from unstructured.partition.api import partition_via_api

class UnstructuredPartitionAPI(Component):
    display_name = "unstructured.io Partition API"
    description = "Send a base64 file to unstructured.io for parsing using unstructured.partition.api.partition_via_api"
    documentation: str = "http://docs.axiestudio.org/components/custom"
    icon = "custom_components"
    name = "unstructured.io Partition API"

    inputs = [
        StrInput(name="api_key", required=True, display_name="API key"),
        StrInput(name="api_url", display_name="API URL", value="https://api.unstructured.io/general/v0/general"),
        MessageInput(
            name="base64_content",
            display_name="base64 Encoded File",
            required=True,
            info="Provide the base64 encoded content of the file",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="filename", 
            display_name="Filename", 
            required=True, 
            placeholder="Enter filename with extension...",
            info="Filename to use as metadata",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="additional_params", 
            display_name="Additional Parameters", 
            required=False, 
            info="JSON-formatted dictionary to pass to the data field of the request to the Unstructured API",
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Output", name="output", method="build_output"),
    ]

    def build_output(self) -> str:
        if not self.base64_content:
            raise ValueError("Please provide the base64 encoded content of the file.")
        
        # Decode the base64 content to bytes
        file_bytes = base64.b64decode(self.base64_content.text)
        
        # Create a file-like object from bytes
        file_like = BytesIO(file_bytes)
        
        # Convert additional_params JSON string to dictionary
        additional_params = {}
        if self.additional_params and self.additional_params.text.strip():
            try:
                additional_params = json.loads(self.additional_params.text)
            except json.JSONDecodeError as e:
                raise ValueError(f"Invalid JSON string in additional_params: {e}")

        # Invoke API
        elements = partition_via_api(
            file=file_like,
            metadata_filename=self.filename,
            api_url=self.api_url,
            api_key=self.api_key,
            **additional_params
        )

        doc_text = "\n".join([str(el) for el in elements])
        return doc_text
code.name: code

import json
import base64
from io import BytesIO
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.io import MessageInput, StrInput, Output, MessageTextInput
from unstructured.partition.api import partition_via_api

class UnstructuredPartitionAPI(Component):
    display_name = "unstructured.io Partition API"
    description = "Send a base64 file to unstructured.io for parsing using unstructured.partition.api.partition_via_api"
    documentation: str = "http://docs.axiestudio.org/components/custom"
    icon = "custom_components"
    name = "unstructured.io Partition API"

    inputs = [
        StrInput(name="api_key", required=True, display_name="API key"),
        StrInput(name="api_url", display_name="API URL", value="https://api.unstructured.io/general/v0/general"),
        MessageInput(
            name="base64_content",
            display_name="base64 Encoded File",
            required=True,
            info="Provide the base64 encoded content of the file",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="filename", 
            display_name="Filename", 
            required=True, 
            placeholder="Enter filename with extension...",
            info="Filename to use as metadata",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="additional_params", 
            display_name="Additional Parameters", 
            required=False, 
            info="JSON-formatted dictionary to pass to the data field of the request to the Unstructured API",
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Output", name="output", method="build_output"),
    ]

    def build_output(self) -> str:
        if not self.base64_content:
            raise ValueError("Please provide the base64 encoded content of the file.")
        
        # Decode the base64 content to bytes
        file_bytes = base64.b64decode(self.base64_content.text)
        
        # Create a file-like object from bytes
        file_like = BytesIO(file_bytes)
        
        # Convert additional_params JSON string to dictionary
        additional_params = {}
        if self.additional_params and self.additional_params.text.strip():
            try:
                additional_params = json.loads(self.additional_params.text)
            except json.JSONDecodeError as e:
                raise ValueError(f"Invalid JSON string in additional_params: {e}")

        # Invoke API
        elements = partition_via_api(
            file=file_like,
            metadata_filename=self.filename,
            api_url=self.api_url,
            api_key=self.api_key,
            **additional_params

        doc_text = "\n".join([str(el) for el in elements])
        return doc_text
